The two that aren’t working are extended via a two port wago. We also decided to use 3 port wagos to connect them into the \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eVRM\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Voltage Regulator Module\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e.
